document_name_accent: ung thu da day di can.json
document_title: Metastatic stomach cancer: Symptoms and treatment
subsection_name: ung-thu-da-day-di-can.json_2_Prognosis of survival of metastatic gastric cancer
subsection_content: According to Dr. Thao, the survival prognosis of patients with metastatic stomach cancer is very limited, most survival time is only measured in months. At this stage, treatments are intended to relieve pain and unpleasant symptoms, helping to improve the patient's quality of life.
subsection_title: ung thu da day di can.json. Prognosis of survival of metastatic gastric cancer
subsection_data:
ung thu da day di can.json. Prognosis of survival of metastatic gastric cancer
According to Dr. Thao, the survival prognosis of patients with metastatic stomach cancer is very limited, most survival time is only measured in months. At this stage, treatments are intended to relieve pain and unpleasant symptoms, helping to improve the patient's quality of life.
